title: Simple Casserole
ingredients: ['6-8 medium white potatoes (peeled, washed and quartered)', '3 medium carrots, peeled, washed and cut into 5cm wide slices', '1 medium white onion, peeled and cut into quarters', '300-500g of beef braising steak, trim fat off & cube the meat', '1 1/2 pints of bisto original power gravy - mix as per instructions - except minus the use of meat juices']
